title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 19
text: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 19 Saturday, 17 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Madonna: The tireless pop star returns to the Bay Area with her “Rebel Heart” tour, promoting the album of the same name. 8 p.m. SAP Center, San Jose. www.ticketmaster.com. Groundbreakers: The Curran’s new onstage interview series opens with Editor at Large Kevin Sessums in conversation with Michael Riedel, author of “Razzle Dazzle: The Battle for Broadway.” 7 p.m. Curran Theatre, 445 Geary St., S.F. www.sfcurran.com. Tollywood Mass actor Ravi Teja and Tamannaah starring Bengal Tiger sound teaser releases today by the Telugu movie makers at 10:30 AM today, listen the sounds for the first time. Recent related news The band is on tour in support of its seventh full-length album, “The Waterfall.” “Pound”: In her latest solo show, Marga Gomez turns her satirical eye... SFGate 2 days ago - Entertainment PLANS to revamp large swathes of Woolacombe Bay Holiday Village have been unveiled as part of a major £4 million investment programme.Woolacombe Bay Holiday...
